name: Monkey Ace
inGameDesc: Flies above the ground shooting volleys of high-pierce darts.
target:
Circle, Figure Infinite, Figure Eight, Centered Path with upgrade, Wingmonkey with Monkey Knowledge

Reverse Flight available for all except Wingmonkey

stats.range:
22 (dummy range)
Ace location depends on path formation

Flight Paths:
Circle: 80
Figure-Eight: 40, 40
Figure-Infinite: 40, 40

path1.name: Rapid Fire
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots faster than normal.
Effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown).

path1.name: Lots More Darts
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots 12 darts at a time.
Effect: Each dart volley shoots 12 darts at a time. Spectres and Flying Fortress instead add +25% pierce to their darts.

path1.name: Fighter Plane
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Flies fast and launches anti-MOAB missiles.
Effect: Every 4 seconds shoots twin anti-MOAB missiles that deal 18 damage per shot and affect up to 4 blimps. Anti-MOAB missiles can only target MOAB-class bloons.

path1.name: Operation: Dart Storm
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots 16 darts per volley, and twice as fast.
Effect: Shoots 16 darts per volley, darts and missiles attack 2x faster, and increases fighter plane missile damage to 24.

path1.name: Sky Shredder
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: The bloons will wish they had never come.
Effect: Attacks 33% faster, pops any bloon type, and shoots 32 darts per volley. Darts deal 3 damage plus another +2 to Ceramics. Anti-MOAB missiles deal 150 damage and up to 6 blimps.

path2.name: Exploding Pineapple
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Drops pineapples to the ground that explode violently after a few seconds. Ace's explosive attacks are improved.
Effect: Drops exploding pineapples onto the ground every 2 seconds, and increases the pierce and blast radius of all of Ace's explosive attacks. Pineapples explode after 3 seconds and deal 1 damage to up to 20 bloons.

path2.name: Spy Plane
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo Bloons and do more damage to them.
Effect: Allows Monkey Ace to hit Camo Bloons and any attacks deal +1 damage to Camo Bloons

path2.name: Bomber Ace
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Drops a line of bombs when crossing the Bloon track.
Effect: Instead of pineapples, drops an array of 4 bombs every 1.36 seconds but only when crossing the track. Bombs deal 3 damage per explosion, and each explosion pops up to 20 bloons.

path2.name: Ground Zero
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Bomb damage increased significantly. Ground Zero Ability: Drops a huge bomb that destroys most things on screen.
Effect: Ability drops a nuke that inflicts 700 damage to all bloons on screen, including explosion-immune bloons, affecting up to 2000 bloons on screen and wiping out any weaker bloons. Main bomb explosions deal 10 damage instead of 3 and can pop up to 40 bloons.

path2.name: Tsar Bomba
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: A very, very large bomb. Someone put a stop to craziness!
Effect: Ability nuke deals 3000 damage, affects up to 5000 bloons on screen, and stuns all survivors of the blast except BADs. Has a shorter ability cooldown. Main bomb explosions pop any bloon type.

path3.name: Sharper Darts
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Darts can pop 8 Bloons each.
Effect: Darts pop up to 8 bloons and bombs gain +12 pierce.

path3.name: Centered Path
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: New central flight path for maximum map coverage.
Effect: Gains the Centered Path flight path, which moves the Ace along a unified path in a circular formation. This flight path can be adjusted so it flies around a different central point.

path3.name: Neva-Miss Targeting
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Darts automatically seek out and pop Bloons by themselves.
Effect: Darts will automatically rotate to continuously seek at nearby bloons.

path3.name: Spectre
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Rapidly fires darts and bombs, dominating most Bloon types easily.
Effect: Exchanges volleys of seeking darts for rapid-fire alternating darts and bombs that both seek. Darts deal 5 damage per shot, and pop up to 15 bloons (+25% with Lots More Darts). Bombs deal 3 damage to up to 20 bloons (+15 with Exploding Pineapple). Darts deal +1 Ceramic damage, and bombs deal +3 Ceramic damage.

path3.name: Flying Fortress
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: This is a BIG plane.
Effect: Attacks +50% faster (0.66x attack cooldown), shoots three rapid-fire attacks: first, last and close, Pops any bloon type. Darts deal 5 damage and bombs deal 4, and darts deal a further +10 to MOAB-class.

paragon.name: Goliath Doomship
paragon.upgradeBody:
Description: A flying shadow of darkness spells Bloon obliteration.
Effect: Shoots quick volleys of 16 non-homing missiles, regularly deploys 4 anti-MOAB homing missiles every shot, and rapidly fires twin darts when facing bloons. Flies twice as slowly as a normal Monkey Ace. Carpet Bomb Ability: Deploys 3 mini-doomships that carpet bomb along a straightline path.
